snippet.title: Warship Fury - Official Launch Trailer(EN)
snippet.description:
Meet a truly legendary MMO shooter for your mobile device! Become part of a community of millions of players from across the world, take a warship into your first massive sea battle, fight in a 5x5 format, and win! Check out the extraordinary variety of warships, maps, modes, and possible strategies that this warship shooter game has to offer!

You'll discover an enormous and action-packed world of warships—historically accurate World War II warships from the USA, Japan, Great Britain, Germany, France, the USSR, China, and many other countries.

There's always room for growth as you progress in this PVP shooting online war game with its well-developed progression system. You’ll research a wide array of warships, from one-star warships to monstrous five-star warships. Upgrade guns and armors to increase your chances of survival and domination. Tune your combat warship to specifically match your playstyle, the battle type specifics, or mode.

Discover a multitude of maps. Warship battles will unfold on a variety of different and distinctive arenas in which victory depends on your team's strategy and knowledge of their surroundings. From Attack on Pearl Harbor to Battle of Midway. From Battle of the Atlantic to Pacific War...

You're never alone. Want to play with a friend? Create a platoon. Want to collaborate on a bigger scale? Join a clan to enter battle as part of a pack of like-minded players and seek glory in Rating Battles or participate in tournaments with prizes! Coordinate your strategy and annihilate your enemies together!

Expect it to be spectacular. The game is automatically optimized for your device. Enjoy the eye-catching features of every battle arena, highly detailed warship models, massive explosions, and flying blown-off turrets.

WARSHIP FURY is a warship universe within your phone or tablet. So hurry up, enter the game, and start your sailing!
_________________________________________________________
NOTE: We welcome any feedback during your experience to improve the game.

Discord : https://discord.gg/fhTjWubh8h

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarshipFuryGame

Contact our customer service at SERVICE@seabirdtech.com.cn if you have any questions.
_________________________________________________________
Note: An internet connection is required to play this game.

Please note this app contains social features that allow you to connect and play with friends and push notifications to inform you when exciting events or new content occurs in the game. You can choose whether or not to utilize these features.
